page.title: 08A SUNDAY WITH STARRA.
page.content: It's Sunday.I get up at about 8 o'clock.I have a wash,draw back all the curtains and make a cup of tea for mum and dad.He has retired from Surrey because we like it here. Dad cooks breakfast,he makes lovely toast,omelettes and fried bread.After breakfast we go out to feed the animals.We have ten chicks,four ducks,two geese,two goslings,a pig,three goats and a rabbit. Afterwards I change my clothes and dad takes me to Sunday School at the church.We say prayers,draw,read Bible stories and sing hymns. If it's dry I usually walk home. When I get in I ask mum where we are going for the day."We can go to the beach if you want to!"she says.Dad comes from watering the greenhouse and I get everything ready.Swim-suit, towel,brush,rubber-ring,flask of
